name: woodland wonders blanket
notes:
this is the ‘woodland wonders’ blanket designed by eleonora tully for king cole. this will be a free 6 week crochet-along (cal) starting on 7th june 2024.

a blanket inspired by a wander through the woods enjoying the woodland wonders! beautiful trees, carpets of bluebells, little acorns and the changing colours of the autumn leaves are just some of the woodland wonders captured in crochet!
for more information and all the yarn details head on over to the king cole and coastal crochet websites:

https://coastalcrochet.com/2024/04/13/introducing-woodland-wonders/

https://www.kingcole.com/woodland-wonders-a-crochet-along-blanket/
